fieldName: Use dynamic Automated ships OP threshold
fieldDescription: Should the game use a dynamic Automated ships OP threshold. Originally it used [40%%] of the original/default battle size of 300 (changeable in the Game Settings). So 180 for regular ships and [120] for automated ships. If this setting is toggled the setting below is ignored and the effect will be as if you toggled it to [40%% of default battle size]. [Directly dependant on the 'Default Battle Size' option from 'Combat' tab]. (vanilla value is 'false')
The 'automated ships' OP threshold for the 'Automated Ships' skill. [If you want to use the value entered here make sure the above option is unchecked] (vanilla value is 120)
